frontend.title: Agency Theme
frontend.description: A responsive landing page theme for a web development agency. It is a created with Bootstrap and inspired by W3Schools Bootstrap theme.

frontend.title: Band Theme
frontend.description: A responsive landing page theme for a band. It is a created with Bootstrap and inspired by W3Schools Bootstrap theme.

frontend.title: Simply Me Theme
frontend.description: A responsive landing page theme for a personal bio. It is a created with Bootstrap and inspired by W3Schools Bootstrap theme.

javascript.title: Stopwatch
javascript.description:
A stopwatch app with rotating gear animation. It's a learning project using pure JavaScript. Bootstrap used for responsive design.

Features:

  • Responsive design
  • Gear rotation according to animation play state
  • Split/Laps saved using localStorage
  • Keyboard shortcuts: Z for Play/Pause and X for Reset/Split

javascript.title: Flex Panel Gallery
javascript.description: An accordian made using CSS flexbox and JavaScript.

javascript.title: JavaScript Drum Kit
javascript.description: Have fun and get creative playing various sounds by pressing displayed keys on the keyboard.

javascript.title: JS+CSS Clock
javascript.description: A clock showing current system time using JavaScript and CSS.

javascript.title: Type Ahead
javascript.description: Filter and show search results from JSON using RegEx.

javascript.title: Custom UI for HTML5 Video Player
javascript.description: A custom UI created using CSS and JavaScript for video tag in HTML5.

javascript.title: Update CSS Variables with JS
javascript.description: Updating padding and blur filter of an image with sliders.

javascript.title: Slide in on Scroll
javascript.description: Slide images when they come into viewport upon scrolling.

javascript.title: Mouse Move Shadow
javascript.description: Move colourful text shadows in different directions when mouse moves.

javascript.title: Fun with HTML5 Canvas
javascript.description: A paint app using HTML5 Canvas where the stroke size and color keeps changing.

javascript.title: Countdown Timer
javascript.description: A timer app with many presets. The user can also set custom value for the timer.

javascript.title: Video Speed Controller
javascript.description: Change speed of video playback using JavaScript.

javascript.title: Click and Drag
javascript.description: Scroll page horizontally by holding mouse and dragging.

javascript.title: Whack-A-Mole!
javascript.description: A game where the user has to click the maximum number of hiding moles until time runs out.

javascript.title: Follow Along Link Highlighter
javascript.description: Animating and resizing link hightlights according to size of text when links are hovered by mouse.

javascript.title: Stripe Follow Along Nav
javascript.description: A morphing dropdown that animates according to the size of its content.

javascript.title: Sticky Nav
javascript.description: A sticky navigation bar using JavaScript.

django.title: VotePlex
django.description:
A voting webapp with charts. Create fun little polls and share with friends. It's written using Django framework.

Features:

  • Responsive design
  • Account registration
  • Edit and delete polls
  • Colourful charts
  • Restriction on voting using cookies and user account

django.title: Blog app
django.description:
A simple blog app created with Django after following the Django Girls tutorial.

Features:

  • Ability to publish posts later
  • Comments feature
  • Contact Us page
  • Approve comments for moderation purposes
